title: How to increase your battery life?
answer:
Remember that it only takes 1 hour to fully charge your battery.
The following are suggestions to increase your battery life and give more time to enjoy your S7 on the move.
? Use only 2G network - >Setting：Settings->Wireless & networks->mobile network->Use only 2G network (enable)
? Disable Data service -> Setting：Settings->Wireless & networks->mobile network->Data service (disable)
? Adjust the brightness of Screen (<1/3) ->  Setting：Settings->sound & display->Auto-Brightness(disabled)
? Brightness -> Set your screen to automatically turn off  (adjustable 30s-60s)
? Disable Bluetooth
? Disable WLAN
? Disable GPS Satellites
? Decrease the media volume
? Turn off applications when they are on idle status
